

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

header <- c( "chr", "start", "end", "count" )
df19 <- read_tsv("/Users/cmdb/qb25-answers/Week 1/hg19-kc-count.bed", col_names = header)

df16 <- read_tsv("/Users/cmdb/qb25-answers/Week 1/hg16-kc-count.bed", col_names = header)

combined_df <- bind_rows(hg19 = df19, hg16 = df16, .id = "assembly")

ggplot(combined_df, aes(x = start, y = count, color = assembly)) +
  geom_line() +
  facet_wrap(.~ chr, scales = "free") +
  labs(
    x = "Chromosome",
    y = "Gene Density",
  ) 

ggsave("exercise2.png")

```
